description: Design and implement the task memory system with scratchpad support per task.
notes: Includes naming rules, execution loop, and per-task state tracking.

description: Reverse engineer the backend + frontend structure of the application, identify outdated patterns, and plan a clean, modern structure.
notes: Focus on user-facing frontend, backend logic, SDKs/agents, and routing logic to create a clean architecture map.

description: Initialize a GitHub repository for the NovelVision AI Agent Protocol System with the proper structure, documentation, and templates.
notes: Repository should be named 'novelvision-agent-protocols' and set to private. All files should be organized within the /Task Memory System/ directory.
